mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.real_name, u.phone, u.dept_code, di.item_name as dept_name, u.status, u.create_time, u.update_time, u.del_flag, r.id as r_id, r.role_name as r_role_name, r.role_code as r_role_code, r.description as r_description, r.status as r_status FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dict_item di ON u.dept_code = di.item_code AND di.dict_id = 10 AND di.del_flag = 0 AND di.status = 1 LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.del_flag = 0 AND (r.del_flag = 0 OR r.del_flag IS NULL)
